mean_cn: v. 激发，启示，使生灵感
mean_en: to make (someone) want to do something; to give (someone) an idea about what to do or create
word_etyma: in进 + spir呼吸 + e强调 → 吸气进去，引申为鼓励 → inspire 鼓励
sentence: Martin Luther King's speech inspired so many people to fight for equality.
sentence_trans: 马丁·路德金的演讲激励了很多人为平等而奋斗。
